product.product_title: VIFUUR Water Sports Shoes Barefoot Quick-Dry Aqua Yoga Socks Slip-on for Men Women, White, 9-10 Women/7.5-8.5 Men
product.cushioning: Not Specified, designed for a barefoot feel with a thin, flexible sole.
product.breathability: High, made from breathable and quick-drying fabric for water use.
product.short_description: Dive into adventure with the VIFUUR Water Sports Shoes, the ultimate barefoot-inspired footwear for men and women who love water activities. Whether you're kayaking, swimming, paddleboarding, or simply walking on the beach, these quick-dry aqua yoga socks in a clean White colorway are designed to protect your feet while providing a natural, flexible feel. The shoe features a breathable and lightweight fabric upper that dries rapidly, preventing that heavy, waterlogged sensation. The stretchable slip-on design, complete with a secure elastic cord lock, ensures a snug and comfortable fit that stays on in the water. The thin, high-traction outsole provides excellent grip on wet, slippery surfaces like rocks, boat decks, and pool floors, protecting your feet from sharp objects while allowing you to feel the ground beneath you. Perfect for a wide range of activities, from water aerobics and surfing to beach yoga and travel, the VIFUUR Water Sports Shoes are the essential, packable companion for your next aquatic escape.
product.about_this_item: Recommended 1: CONVENIENCE - Smooth neck design prevents chafing when wearing our water shoes. It is convenient to wear and take off. Recommended 2: COMFORTABLE FIT -- Breathable and smooth fabrics with fine stretch on uppers. Like socks, flexible and comfortable. Recommended 3: RUBBER OUTSOLE & FOOT SAFETY -- Wearable and top-quality rubber sole, which protects your feet from being hurt by sharp objects. Recommended 4: OCCASION - Yoga Training, beach, swimming, pool, weight training, wake-boarding, sailing, boating, kayaking, windsurfing, cycling, jogging, walking, fishing, beach volleyball, gardening, lawn, car-washing and driving. Family outings! Tips?VARIOUS SIZE AVAILABLE -- fit different feet,little kids, big kids,men,women are available.
